column2: The tagEmpireName has for centuries dominated much of the world as an undisputed hegemon, with our power and sheer strength unmatched. However, such a gargantuan empire needs an equally massive bureaucracy in order to sustain itself, and we have pushed well beyond the limits of what our bureaucracy can handle, leaving the empire unmanageable, vastly overextended, and on the verge of collapse. In drastic times, drastic decisions must be made, and our best course of action is something that would have been unthinkable generations prior: Split the tagEmpireName in half, with an empire in the east and another in the west. Which half of the empire shall we continue to rule over?

The tagEmpireName has for centuries dominated much of the world as an undisputed hegemon, with it's power and sheer strength unmatched. However, such a gargantuan empire needs an equally massive bureaucracy in order to sustain itself, and the tagEmpireName has pushed well beyond the limits of what it's bureaucracy can handle, leaving the empire unmanageable, vastly overextended, and on the verge of collapse. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has taken drastic measures in a last-ditch effort in order to save the empire: Henceforth, the tagEmpireName shall be split in two, with an empire in the east and another in the west. Only time will tell whether or not [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] will be remembered as the tagEmpireName's savior, or as the destroyer who hastened the tagEmpireName's demise, but regardless, the world order has fundamentally changed.

The tagEmpireName has for centuries dominated much of the world as an undisputed hegemon, with our power and sheer strength unmatched. However, such a gargantuan empire needs an equally massive bureaucracy in order to sustain itself, and we have pushed well beyond the limits of what our bureaucracy can handle, leaving the empire unmanageable, vastly overextended, and on the verge of collapse. In drastic times, drastic decisions must be made, and our best course of action is something that would have been unthinkable generations prior: Split the tagEmpireName in half, with an empire in the east and another in the west.
Your empire will split into two separate realms and you can choose to either rule over the eastEmpireName or the westEmpireName. In addition, you will also gain a powerful bloodline.

Generations ago, the mighty tagEmpireName was split in half, ripped into two withered husks fighting and squabbling over the shreds of what once was and past glory, lost seemingly forever to the sands of time. Today, however, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has reconquered the last of the core imperial territories, and as the sole surviving claimant to it's legacy, has proclaimed a restoration of the empire of old, forged anew from it's ashes and ruin, ushering in a glorious renaissance of power and a new age of TAGEmpireAdj dominance.

Today, however, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has reconquered the last of the core imperial territories, and as the sole surviving claimant to it's legacy, has proclaimed a restoration of the empire of old, forged anew from it's ashes and ruin, ushering in a glorious renaissance of power and a new age of TAGEmpireAdj dominance.

Generations ago, the mighty tagEmpireName was split in half, ripped into two withered husks fighting and squabbling over the shreds of what once was. If we were to conquer the other half of the empire, we could forge anew the empire of old from it's ashes and ruin, ushering in a glorious renaissance of power and a new age of TAGEmpireAdj dominance.
The tagEmpireName will be restored, forever cementing your legacy and name in history. In addition, you will gain the ability to reconquer lost TAGEmpireAdj lands and acquire a new bloodline.
